name: Synapse workspace deployment
description: Deployment task for synapse workspace v2
helpMarkDown: Displays the name of your extension v2
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: TemplateFile
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing to the Azure Resource Manager template. For more information about the templates see https://aka.ms/azuretemplates. To get started immediately use template https://aka.ms/sampletemplate.

inputs.name: ParametersFile
inputs.label: Template parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing for the parameters file for the Azure Resource Manager template.

inputs.name: AzureResourceManagerConnection
inputs.label: Synapse workspace connection type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the managed service connection type that you created to connect to the Synapse workspace.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Synapse workspace resource group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the resource group of the target Synapse workspace.

inputs.name: TargetWorkspaceName
inputs.label: Synapse workspace name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the Synapse workspace name located in the resource group that you specified.

inputs.name: DeleteArtifactsNotInTemplate
inputs.label: Delete Artifacts Not In Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, all artifacts in the workspace, not present in the template will be deleted. sqlpools, sparkpools, integration runtimes will not be deleted.

inputs.name: DeployManagedPrivateEndpoints
inputs.label: Deploy managed private endpoints in template
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the extension will deploy all managed private endpoints in the template.

inputs.name: OverrideArmParameters
inputs.label: OverrideParameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter any ARM parameters that you want to override, separated by a space, for example, -key1 value1 -key2 value2 -key3 value3. You may use a Key Vault task to output.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Cloud environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the type of cloud environment in which the Synapse workspace is located.
